item.description:
Hello ladies and gentleman!! Next Thursday night we will be heading out to The Sports Bar in North Windham! Respect to my boy Mike for recommending a fun night out there since we are a Connecticut group that goes everywhere in the state. Let's all plan to be at this venue anywhere from 9:00p.m. to 09:30p.m.

You can bring your friends, family, or significant others. The more the merrier! I've been there before and it's a nice place. Hope all of you are doing well plus we all look forward to having fun and meeting new members. If you have any questions you can email me or call me at 860-919-9782. Till next week enjoy life and have fun : ).

~John~
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text me 860-919-9782. You can also see what I look like in my pictures so you can just look for me as well.
item.name: Thursday Night at The Sports Bar In North Windham!
